sections.purpose: To assess locomotor activity of animals using photoelectric beam interruptions.
sections.scope: Applicable to CNS stimulant and depressant screening in Pharmacology.
procedure: Switch ON the photoactometer and allow a brief warm-up period.
Check that all photoelectric cells and indicators are functioning.
Place the test animal in the observation arena and close the lid.
Set the observation period using an external or built-in timer.
Start the test and record the activity counts at the end of the session.
Remove the animal and clean the arena with disinfectant between tests.
precautions: Maintain uniform lighting conditions around the apparatus.
Avoid placing reflective objects near the sensors.
Ensure the arena floor is non-slippery.
Handle animals gently to avoid stress-induced variability.
